description: Stacy X is an alias of Miranda Leevald, a fictional character in the Marvel Comics universe. She is a mutant prostitute who was briefly affiliated with the X-Men and was more recently known as a member of the latest incarnation of the now disbanded New Warriors. She first appeared in Uncanny X-Men #399 (November 2001) by Joe Casey and Tom Raney. More recently she has been known as Ripcord.
name: Stacy X
powers: Ability to determine people's emotions based on their pheromones
